page.title: 05PELICAN CROSSING
page.content: By{Coleham School}there is a new pelican crossing. We questioned people about it. Most people we stopped gave favourable comments about it. Some people thought it was a great idea and said it was long over due. Others thought it was in a stupid place being on a bend and should have been built farther along. We had all sorts of comments from it being a time waster to it not giving you time to cross. Most said it helps young and old to cross and agreed it was better now we had one. We watched people crossing the road and nearly half did not bother using the pelican crossing. We thought this was because people had to wait too long after a car had gone through before it would change back. We believe the lights sequence should be speeded up so that more people would use it more often.
